You've clearly got a lot to say, but keep it under 140 characters for Twitter okay? Thanks!

COLLECTING DATA IN DIGITAL RAIN BARRELS...
This application was built with Appcelerator, the number one platform for cloud service-enabled mobile applications.
The natve mobile app was built on Titanium, the open source SDK for creating pure native applications in JavaScript.
The back end for this app is implemented using Appcelerator Cloud Services, bar-none the fastest way to add a scalable, feature-rich back end to your mobile apps with no server-side code.

Application logic was developed using Alloy, a component-oriented client side MVC framework for Titanium that provides declarative markup for native UI, separation of concerns, and a predictable project structure for Titanium applications
This application is open source under the Apache 2.0 License, and is available for download at http://bit.ly/codestrong_src

We'd like to also give special thanks to Maria Iu, Greg DiPaolo, Monica Malone, Lisa Kohn, Tony Lukasavage, Fred Spencer, Kevin Whinnery, and the rest of the Appcelerator team that helped make this application possible. Code Strong!
